# Welcome Back 

<br>

Welcome Back to the Introduction to R Class!

- **Step 1:** Remember to clone the class materials from the [intro-to-r]() repository on GitHub using git. 

- **Step 2:** Open up the website materials by clicking on the `_site/index.html` file. Open the file in any browser. 

- **Step 3:** Separately, open up the `intro-to-r.Rproj` file to open up the R project related to this class. 

## Recap

- Data Import and Export
  - `read_*` functions
  - `write_*` functions
  - Feather and Parquet files
  - `janitor::clean_names()`
- Vectorized Conditions
  - `if_else()` function
  - `case_when()` function
- Strings
  - `str_*()` functions
- Attributes
  - Factors
  - Dates
- Reshaping Data
  - `pivot_wider()`
  - `pivot_longer()`
- Combining Data Frames
  - `bind_rows()`, `bind_cols()`
  - `inner_join()`, `full_join()`, `left_join()`, `right_join()`
  - `tidylog`
